findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting an unlimited number of Sundae tokens, which can lead to inflation and devaluation of existing tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls
findings.description: The functions setBuyBacker, setFees, _setFees, setFeeReceivers, setSwapBackSettings, setTargetLiquidity, and setDistributorSettings do not have access modifiers, making them unprotected.

findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in transfer and approve functions
findings.description: The contract contains a reentrancy vulnerability in its transfer and approve functions.

findings.title: Lack of access control in certain functions
findings.description: Some functions do not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to perform actions.

findings.title: Insecure implementation of fee logic
findings.description: The contract's fee logic has been implemented insecurely, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Insufficient validation of user input
findings.description: The contract does not properly validate user-provided inputs, which can lead to unexpected behavior or security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Unprotected sensitive data storage
findings.description: Storage of sensitive data without proper protection.
